artist: The School of the Master of Mary of Burgundy
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
medium: Ink, gouache and gold leaf on vellum
text: These leaves from a pocket-size Book of Hours feature prayers and a list of saints. In order to compress the text into this small format, many words and phrases appear in abbreviated form. For example, each saint's name is followed by the abbreviation or', which is short for Ora pro nobis, or Pray for us.
title: Leaf from a Book of Hours (recto and verso)
